title: The Portrait of a Lady - situation

content.prompt: Which of the following describes the immediate situation of the passage?

choices.label: Mr. Touchett has decided to join his wife in Florence.
Plans for the Touchetts’ divorce have been set in motion.
Mrs. Touchett has returned to her home in Florence after a visit with her husband in England.
Mrs. Touchett has traveled to her husband’s home in England after a sojourn abroad.

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Explain the function of a significant event or related set of significant events in a plot.
